lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring.
lender.occupational_info: I make investments for the wealthy. Now I would like to invest in the poor.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I can observe the direct impact that my loan can make to a community. Kiva allows me to enlist others to the cause by showing the progress that my entrepreneur is making in a very tangible way.
lender.occupational_info: I provide legal services to individuals affected by investment losses caused by a stockbroker.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I love this concept...simple, personal and effective.
lender.occupational_info: I am at home with my boys for now. I am an English as a Second Language professional. I love other languages and cultures and helping people adjust to a new setting while maintaining their sense of identity and pride in their heritage.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I care very much about international development and I especially love Uganda -- the country and its people.
lender.occupational_info: I joined the provincial government as a writer but have since become an administrator. I work behind the scenes to help municipalities, largely through advisory services, program and policy development and funding programs.

lender.name: Andrea & Wilkin
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have expendable income, and feel like I want to be able to share that with people who can use that for their own economic development. I believe in the micro-credit model and think it can change families across the world become self-sustaining entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Christal
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I know a little bit about a lot of things and I enjoy sharing that knowledge. I also collect knowledge from others. What can you teach me today?

lender.name: Kenneth

lender.occupational_info: I make outdoor furniture. I am responsible for all areas of my business including sales, admin and production.

lender.occupational_info: Ensuring safe drinking water for an urban population through treatment and testing.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: As a humanitarian, business entrepreneur as well as an advocate for equality, justice and peace, I feel that individuals deserve the opportunity to help themselves become better than their present conditions. I believe in the intertwining of our economies. There is a social responsibility to pave the future for a sound financial basis and economy for our futures. The step to take on such a responsibility is a major decision in which we should embrace and learn. Learn how all financial systems work in accordance to our own.
lender.occupational_info: Currently pursuing my Masters degree as a dual major, in the fields of International business and education, my work is challenging but meaningful. Also I anticipate continuing my studies in the area Eastern/Western medicine on the Ph.D Level and furthering my interest in Global International affairs ultimately leading to the goal of ambassadorship of a country as well as other goals and endeavors.

lender.loan_because: give is the best thing you can do, it makes yuo feel good with yourself but even more important is the fact that you are helping to someone who never get a chance before

lender.occupational_info: I like seeing someone better them selfs when i came across this sight that was exactly what i saw . I have a heart and i have helped alout of people .And i will be glad to help out others threw this website and see there success & better there lives .

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I don't have much, but there are those who have less, and there have been many who have helped me along the way. The least I can do is give when I can.

lender.occupational_info:
Retouching reality
Studio shots are rarely perfect, especially when it comes to fashion and beauty where models and environments have to look flawless.But perfection can be achieved with a little tweaking in Photoshop...
G6Media is an ambitious Graphic Design Studio Start up that is capable of generating any idea the mind can think of from concept to completion. I was always an avid practitioner of various artforms such as pencil sketching and painting scenery and subjects since I was a child, some techniques came more natural to me than others.Learning photoshop and its possibilities only came to me after many improbable attempts to create the pictures I created so naturally on paper' but digitally instead.It certainly is a continual learning experience because the Possibilities are truly endless.
http://www.modelmayhem.com/HumbleOne
Thanks guys for supporting my art.

lender.name: The AML/CFT Group
lender.loan_because: The AML/CFT Group's founders have lived, worked and traveled around the world and seen the impact microfinance and trust can have on individuals and communities. The Group believes that all persons should have access to finance and that the financial system should be protected from abuse.
lender.occupational_info:
The AML/CFT Group is a consultancy dedicated to protecting the integrity of the global financial system. Using expert knowledge and empirical research, we help public and private actors improve the effectiveness of Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism (AML/CFT) measures.
Our partners and analysts are skilled professionals who understand banking in emerging markets, the importance and challenges of international financial flows and the detrimental effects of the illicit economy.
We use multilingual resources, regional expertise and the latest technology to track AML/CFT developments around the world and generate some of the most in-depth and rigorous analysis available to AML/CFT professionals.
